main.name: I am James
main.bio: A senior software developer with great experiences, always prioritize inovation and trustworthy and come up with the agile approach. I'm passionate in this industry and I alway take responsibility for my own on going professional development wihch I believe will help my customer's business stay at the forefrontend of this position with my qualifications, experiences and creativity.
main.contactmessage: You can touch on me easily through.

education.description: My education at ATC encouraged grow my passions for web develop and programming. The course includes computer architecture, operating systems, procedural and process - oriented programming, programming microprocessors, programming architecture, client-server systems, visual programming tools, computer networks, organization of databases. My educations background allowed me to thrive in this career and my trainings on this have made me at this forefront of this industry.

work.title: Web Application Developer
work.description: My team consisted of front-end and back-end QA Engineers, Architects, UI/UX Designers, Product Owners, and Business Analysts

work.title: Web Application Developer
work.description: Supported the migration of an existing application to React js/Nuxt.js. Developed a methodology to gradually transition legacy a jQuery application to React/Redux. Implemented payment UI and API integration for both depositing funds and withdrawals. Found and fixed various rendering performance issues in the app.

work.title: Full-stack Developer
work.description: Multi-tenant application, allowing multiple organisations to register and get access to their own area. Design and build databases for the management of patients and the medical records in MonogoDB database. Developed website with Node JS Framework and improved application's performance and speed with React trending technologies such as React hooks, HOCs, Redux and more.

work.title: Frontend Web Developer
work.description: Collaborated in the communication with clients, and worked more than 40 hrs per week. Re-building UI/UX with React js (Customized template and created new features on the Dashboard for Service Web Project). SQL Query Optimizing For generating reports (1 hour to 3seconds). Every versions of codebase had been manipulated by using docker and easily deployed to AWS EKS with autoscaling feature.
